570166.effect: 1 Tuner monster + 1 or more non-Tuner monster(s)While face-up on the field, this card cannot be banished. (Quick Effect): You can place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap. When your opponent activates a card effect that targets a card(s) on the field, while this card is treated as a Continuous Trap: Negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card, then Special Summon this card. If this card is in the GY: You can discard 1 card; your opponent draws 2 card, then, Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Hymmnos -METHOD_" once per turn.
570166.name: Hymmnos -METHOD_

702928.effect: 1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner MonstersUp to twice per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or by card effects. Up to twice per turn if a monster(s) you control is destroyed or banished by your opponents monster effect, or destroyed by battle: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, draw 1 card. If this card is Banished, you can Special Summon this card during your 2nd End Phase, after this card was banished.
702928.name: Izo Kiru D.D The Protector Of The Arknight
702928.treated_as: Izo Kiru D.D The Protector Of The Arknight

1305406.effect: 1 Tuner + 2+ non-Tuner monstersOnce per turn, you can either (Quick Effect): Target 1 face-up monster on the field; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. A monster equipped with this card cannot attack, its effects are negated, also it loses 2000 ATK. If this card is sent to the GY because the equipped monster has left the field: You can Special Summon this card in Attack Position. You can only control 1 "Layzner".
1305406.name: Layzner

584258.effect: 1 Tuner monster + 1 or more non-Tuner monster(s) Once per turn: You can target 1 card you control or in your GY; Shuffle that card into the Deck. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it it was sent there this turn: Banish this card; Add 1 card with the same name as a card that was shuffle in to the Deck by this card's effect from your Deck to your hand. On the third Standby Phase after this card was banished: Special Summon this card. You can only Synchro Summon 1 "Lysergic Mage Of Arknight" per turn.
584258.name: Lysergic Mage Of The Arknight

729916.effect: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monstersIf this card is Special Summoned, while your opponent has more total cards in their hand and field than you do: You can target 1 card on the field, then banish it, if the banish card was a Monster Card, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original ATK. During the End Phase, if this card was Synchro Summoned this turn: Return it to the Extra Deck. Then, if all of the materials that were used for the Synchro Summon of this card are in your GY: You can Special Summon them. You can only use each effect of "Majin Saber Stage 2" once per turn.
729916.name: Majin Saber Stage 2

1646214.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)You can only control 1 "Shirakashi Dakki". When a "Shirakashi" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field from the Extra Deck, while this card is in the GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Shirakashi" monsters. If this card is in your GY, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can target 1 non-Tuner Yokai monster in your GY; banish both it and this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Yokai Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck whose Level equals the total Levels those 2 monsters had.
1646214.name: Shirakashi Dakki

1646243.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Shirakashi" monster from your Deck, except "Shirakashi Hajun". If this card is banished: You can draw 1 card. If "Shirakashi Style Synthesis" is face-up on the field, you can instead draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Shirakashi Hajun" once per turn.
1646243.name: Shirakashi Hajun

1647812.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Shirakashi" monster from your hand or GY. If this card is banished: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. If "Shiranui Style Synthesis" is face-up on the field, you can banish that target instead. You can only use each effect of "Shirakashi Shafu" once per turn.
1647812.name: Shirakashi Shafu

1647818.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)When exactly 1 "Shirakashi" card (and no other cards) is targeted for an attack or by an opponent's card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card from your hand or field, then target 1 "Shirakashi" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, then if it would be an appropriate target for that attack/effect, you can make it become the new target of that attack/effect. If this card is banished: You can Special Summon this card during the End Phase, but place it on the bottom of the Deck when it leaves the field. If "Shirakashi Style Synthesis" is on the field, you can Special Summon it immediately instead. You can only use each effect of "Shirakashi Jyougen" once per turn.
1647818.name: Shirakashi Jyougen

1647833.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)You can Special Summon this card (from your hand or GY) by Tributing 1 "Shirakashi" monster from your hand or field, except "Shirakashi Yasha". If Summoned this way, it gains ATK equal to the original ATK or DEF of the Tributed monster (whichever is higher), also any card destroyed by battle with it is banished instead of being sent to the GY. If this card is banished: You can add to your hand 1 "Shirakashi" card that is banished or in your Deck, then if "Shirakashi Style Synthesis" is on the field, you can Special Summon 1 Yokai monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Shirakashi Yasha" once per turn.
1647833.name: Shirakashi Yasha

1650290.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)If you control a "Shirakashi" card, other than "Shirakashi Yuki-Musume" while this card is in your hand or GY: You can Special Summon this card, then send 1 "Shirakashi" card from your Deck to the GY. If this card is banished: You can target 1 "Shirakashi" card in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of Yuki-Musume, the Ice Mayakashi once per turn.
1650290.name: Shirakashi Yuki-Musume

1650241.effect: If you control a "Shirakashi" monster: Excavate the top cards of your Deck, equal to the number of Yokai monsters you control, and if you do, add 1 of them to your hand, also shuffle the rest back into the Deck. If you would banish a monster from the GY by the effect of a "Shirakashi" Synchro monster in the GY, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use 1 "Ghost Meets Girl - A Shirakashi Story" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1650241.name: Ghost Meets Girl - A Shirakashi Story
1650241.treated_as: Ghost Meets Girl - A Shirakashi Story

1650199.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Shirakashi" monster from your Deck to your hand. At the end of the Damage Step, if your Yokai monster battled an opponent's monster: You can banish 1 "Shirakashi monster from your hand or GY; banish that opponent's monster. You can only use each effect of "Shirakashi Style Synthesis" once per turn.
1650199.name: Shirakashi Style Synthesis

1650217.effect: Target cards in your opponent's GY, up to the number of "Shirakashi" monsters you control; banish them, then you can return your banished Yokai monsters to the GY, up to the number of cards banished by this effect. You can banish this card from your GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 "Shirakashi" Synchro monsters, using Yokai monsters you control as Synchro Material. You can only use 1 "Shirakashi Style Reversal" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1650217.name: Shirakashi Style Reversal

1650011.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)1 Yokai Tuner + 1+non-Tuner monstersUp to thrice per turn, before resolving an opponent's card effect, and before conducting the turn player's normal draw, you can reveal the top card of either player's Deck and either banish it or place it on top of the Deck. You can only use each of the following effects of "Shirakashi Gashadokuro" once per turn.? If a "Shirakashi" monster in your possession is destroyed by an opponent's card while this card is in the GY: You can banish 1 other monster from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can activate this effect; this turn, this card is unaffected by other cards' effects. 1649833.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)1 Yokai Tuner + 1+non-Tuner monstersYokai monsters you control can attack directly. 1649833.name: Shirakashi Oboro-Guruma

1649881.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)1 Yokai Tuner + 1+non-Tuner monstersOnce per turn, if a Yokai monster is added to your hand, you can reveal it, then either draw 1 card or add 1 "Shirakashi" Spell/Trap from your GY to your hand. If a "Shirakashi" monster in your possession is destroyed by an opponent's card while this card is in the GY: You can banish 1 other monster from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card. 1649836.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)1 Yokai Tuner + 1+non-Tuner monstersUp to thrice per turn, when an opponent's card or effect resolves, they must banish 1 card of the same original card type (Monster, Spell, Trap) from their Deck or the effect is negated (their choice). You can only use each of the following effects of "Shirakashi Tsuchigumo" once per turn.● If a "Shirakashi" monster in your possession is destroyed by an opponent's card while this card is in the GY: You can banish 1 other monster from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card. Only 1 "Shirakashi" Synchro monster can activate its effects when Synchro Summoned during the turn you activate this effect.

1650002.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)1 Yokai Tuner + 1+non-Tuner monstersEach time your opponent activates a card or effect, inflict 400 damage to them immediately after it resolves. 1650265.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.)2 Yokai monstersMonsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK for each Yokai monster in your GY with a different original name. You can only use 1 of the following "Shirakashi Spirit Trainer" effects per turn, and only once that turn.?If a "Shirakashi" monster is Special Summoned to a zone this card points to: You can discard 1 card; Set 1 "Shirakashi" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck.?During the End Phase, if this card is currently banished because it was banished this turn: You can target 1 of your banished "Shirakashi" cards; return it to the GY.

(Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 Yokai monster you control, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Shirakashi" monster from your GY with a different original name than the Tributed monster. 574158.effect:
Why have you come, O mortal?
Do you want to know the truth?
If so, come and take my hand.
We will go on a journey.
But know this, before you act.
When you're one with the spirits,
You'll leave this world forever.
574158.name: Genjutsu Dragon

"Genjutsu Spirit" + 1+ "Genjutsu" Ritual monsters
Cannot be Fusion Summoned. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by Tributing the above monsters you control (you do not use Polymerization). This card can attack a number of times each Battle Phase, up to the number of Ritual monsters used for this card's Summon.
